name: Anagram Nineteen.
description:
Augmented Reality Digital Sculpture of Glitched Harajuku-Inspired Model, Rotating on Pulpit of Spikes, and Encased in Three Light Rings.

“Glitched Anagrams” are Augmented Reality (AR) digital sculptures that explore the body as an infinite re-assembly of visual anagrams. I define anagram as a sentence - composed of numbers strung together that when re-assembled create new forms and relationships. Altering the 3D model’s appearance by glitching its code is a reflection of this idea - that the body can be restructured in an infinite number of ways according to its anagrammatic structure.
